brief_title: Brain Imaging and Pain in Irritable Bowel Syndrome
brief_summary: This study examines the mechanisms, including brain imaging of placebo analgesia
criteria: Inclusion criteria: - Irritable Bowel Syndrome - English speaking Exclusion criteria: - Chronic pain condition other than Irritable Bowel Syndrome - Medical condition that would contraindicate use of lidocaine - Clinical criteria for fibromyalgia - Presence of systemic disease such as diabetes, thyroid, gastrointestinal or liver disease, collagen vascular disease, malignancy, focal or neurological - Seropositive HIV - Pregnancy
